com.crawljax.core.configuration

Class CrawljaxConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.core.configuration.CrawljaxConfiguration

  • public class CrawljaxConfiguration
extends Object
    Configures the Crawler. Set it up using the builderFor(String) function.
